title: Smells quickly

text:
Arm & Hammer Slide definitely does what it promises when it comes to clumping. The clumps form quickly and hold together very well, which makes scooping and cleaning easy, especially if you use an automatic litter box.

Unfortunately, the biggest downside for me is how badly this litter sticks to my cat‚Äôs paws. The texture is very fine and sandy, and once it gets even slightly damp, it clings to my cat‚Äôs paws. This causes the litter to be tracked all over my house, including furniture and, worst of all, my bed and bed sheets. The clay itself leaves visible marks and smudges on my bedding, which is extremely frustrating and unhygienic.

Because of the constant mess and cleanup, I won‚Äôt be repurchasing this litter, despite its excellent clumping performance. If tracking and cleanliness are important to you, this may not be the best option.
